name: wms-capabilities
description: WMS service Capabilities > JSON, based on openlayers

scripts.start: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css & serve -p 3001
scripts.build-css: npm run build-less && npm run compress-less
scripts.compress: npm run compress-js && npm run compress-js-no-rbush
scripts.compress-js: browserify -s WMSCapabilities index.js | uglifyjs --comments -m -c drop_console=true,warnings=false > dist/wms-capabilities.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run compress && npm run build-css

author: Alexander Milevski <info@w8r.name>
